headline: PayPal and Blue Owl Capital Collaborate On A Multi-Year U.S. BNPL Receivables Agreement
summary: PayPal Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ:PYPL) is among the 10 Best Mobile Payments Stocks to Buy Now. PayPal Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ:PYPL) has announced that funds controlled by Blue Owl Capital will purchase about $7 billion in U.S. “Pay in 4” buy now, pay later (BNPL) loans over the next two years. The firm will keep running its […]

headline: How PayPal’s New AI Shopping Tools Have Shifted the Investment Narrative at PayPal Holdings (PYPL)
summary: In September 2025, PayPal announced new AI-powered shopping features in PayPal Honey, enabling users to view real-time product recommendations, merchant options, and exclusive offers directly within AI chatbot conversations. This marks a shift toward comprehensive commerce intelligence, aiming to make AI-driven retail research instantly actionable for consumers and more effective for merchants. By evolving PayPal Honey from a simple coupon finder into a value-focused commerce platform,...

headline: 2 Value Stocks for Long-Term Investors and 1 We Turn Down
summary: Value investing has created more billionaires than any other strategy, like Warren Buffett, who built his fortune by purchasing wonderful businesses at reasonable prices. But these hidden gems are few and far between - many stocks that appear cheap often stay that way because they face structural issues.
